title: Fifty Shades of Kinky Sex
itunes:title: Fifty Shades of Kinky Sex
itunes:subtitle: Fifty Shades of Kinky Sex
description:
Unless you’ve been living under a rock for the past two years, you know that 50 Shades of Grey has been taking over the world. In this show, Emily is bringing you your 50 Shades of Kink education and telling you the little things you can do to bring BDSM into the bedroom.

 

First Emily breaks down the appeal of BDSM, tackles some common myths surrounding the lifestyle, and shares the secret to a successful powerplay relationship: Mutual trust. She explains how to take elements of the popular novel and use it to fuel your own sexual fantasies, no sex dungeon necessary, and tells you which props are must-haves for your kinky sex starter kit - Bondage tape, blindfolds and feathers, oh my!

Curious? Don’t miss this extra kinky episode of Sex With Emily..


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
